All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Class for the Card model in this Jest game.
    CLI  
    Colors  
    Game
    Core game engine.
    GameConfig  
    GameConfigController
    Controller class for the Game Configuration UI.
    GameController
    Consumer in the Producer/Consumer design pattern implemented in the project : CLI and GUI controllers (producers) put int messages in this class's queue, and this class (consumer) process the messages.
    GameGUI  
    GameGUIController
    Controller for the in-game GUI.
    JestCounter
    Interface to implement in a Jest-counting class.
    JestCounterBase
    Basic Jest points counter based off Jest game official rules.
    Main  
    MainFrame  
    Menu  
    MenuController
    Controller for the menu GUI.
    Player
    Class for the Player model in the Jest game.
    RealPlayer
    Class for real players model.
    Results  
    ResultsController
    Controller for the results GUI.
    StratBest
    Strategy for bots where the bot select the best visible card he can choose every time.
    Strategy
    Interface to implement different Strategies following the design pattern asked in the project subject.
    StratRandom
    Strategy for bots where the bot select a random card in the cards he can choose.
    Trophies  
    Values  
    Variant
    Interface to implement different variants of the game rules.
    Variant1
    First variant of the game where the trophies are enabled in random to the 2 trophy cards.
    Variant2
    Second variant of the game where the trophies are hidden, so you're in the dark during the entire game : trophies are important for the end-game scoring !
    VariantBase
    Official rules of the Jest game.
    VirtualPlayer
